diff_hunk:
@@ -655,6 +655,7 @@ def embedding(input, embedding_matrix,
         norm_type (float, optional): The p of the p-norm to compute for the max_norm option
         scale_grad_by_freq (boolean, optional): if given, this will scale gradients by the frequency of
                                                 the words in the mini-batch.
+        sparse (boolean, optional): if True, gradient w.r.t. weight matrix will be a sparse tensor.
body: We should at least say under what conditions can this be used (i.e. restrict to leaves and mention which optimizers can handle sparse updates)
